column2: The current Permanent Regent is unfit to serve as the Permanent Regent at present. As a result, [From.GetBestName] seeks to become the new Permanent Regent.
The current Permanent Regent is unfit to serve as the Permanent Regent at present. As a result, [From.GetBestName] seeks to become the new Permanent Regent.
The current Permanent Regent is unfit to serve as the Permanent Regent at present. As a result, [From.GetBestName] seeks to become the new Permanent Regent.
[Root.TopLiege.GetBestName]'s claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven is not as solid at it might be, and perhaps it is time for a new imperial dynasty...
Either belongs to a Chinese Imperial bloodline, holds a kingdom-tier title, or is the [From.Liege.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven's Grand Chancellor.
